Record.ClassificationPath: Pathological Conditions, Signs and Symptoms/Pathologic Processes/Death/Fetal Death/Fetal Resorption
Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Fetal Death/Fetal Resorption
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: The disintegration and assimilation of the dead FETUS in the UTERUS at any stage after the completion of organogenesis which, in humans, is after the 9th week of GESTATION. It does not include embryo resorption (see EMBRYO LOSS).
